ARTICLE.TITLE: Turkey Wealth Fund seeks bigger play in China’s Belt and Road initiative
ARTICLE.TEXT: stories_left_placeholder You have one free story left this month. You have stories_left_placeholder free stories left this month. This is your last free story of the month. Register to continue reading our free content.

METADATA.description: The Turkey Wealth Fund is looking to China for investment in a number of major infrastructure projects, according to CEO Zafer Sonmez.
